responses.rationale: The segment describes factual events (infections, killing of birds) but contains no negation.
The segment reports the total number of birds killed but contains no negation.
The segment reports the number of birds killed in Iowa but contains no negation.
The segment provides background information about Iowa's egg production but contains no negation.
The segment provides background information about Iowa's turkey production but contains no negation.
The segment reports the location of recent cases but contains no negation.
The segment reports the confirmation of a case but contains no negation.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases but contains no negation.
The segment explains the likely cause of spread but contains no negation.
